title: Movie Title Stills
content:
Stumbled across this site yesterday.  
A great collection of movie titles.

[http://www.annyas.com/screenshots/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824213346/http:/www.annyas.com/screenshots/ "http://www.annyas.com/screenshots/")

comments.content: Cool. Thanks for posting. Nice looking site, too.
You're welcome. I like the design as well. Garage Gothic I think?
